description: This file defines the INoteRepository interface which abstracts persistence operations for 'Note' objects in the NotesApp project.

classes.name: INoteRepository
classes.description: Interface for note persistence operations, including retrieving all notes, getting a note by ID, creating, updating, and deleting notes.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Returns all notes as an IEnumerable<Note>.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its Guid ID, returning null if not found.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Creates a new note in the persistence layer.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note, returning true if successful.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its Guid ID, returning true if successfully deleted.
